description: This file defines the ChatRepository class which provides an abstraction layer for accessing chat message data via Firebase APIs. It includes methods for subscribing to real-time message updates, loading message history, and sending messages.

classes.name: ChatRepository
classes.description: Provides methods to interact with chat messages, including subscribing to real-time updates, loading history, and sending messages.

methods.name: subscribeConversation
methods.description: Returns a stream of chat messages for a given conversation ID, using real-time subscription.

methods.name: loadHistory
methods.description: Fetches historical chat messages for a specified conversation ID.

methods.name: send
methods.description: Sends a chat message via the API.
